newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Canberra monitoring ABS jobs change-Vanstone.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Canberra monitoring ABS jobs change-Vanstone.

text.p: Australian Employment Minister Amanda Vanstone said on Thursday the government would watch closely for any effects from the Australian Bureau of Statistics' (ABS) change in labour market sampling methodology.
Taking this into account, seasonally adjusted employment would have risen by between 98,000 and 113,000 since June 1996, compared with the published estimate of 68,000, Vanstone said.

"Although the ABS has advised that the impact on the unemployment rate and the participation rate is less clear at this stage, the government will closely monitor any effects emerging and their implications for meeting the budget
forecasts," she said in a statement.
